text: Elina Kechicheva is Bulgarian photographer based in Paris. Her career was started by the participation in prestigious Festival international de mode et de photographie of Hyéres followed by publication in the book of the parisian art director Patrick Remy "Paradise". She has worked with famous models as Lara Stone,http://lookbooks.com/marketplace/shotview- photographers/photographers/elina-kechicheva/editorial/lara-stone-for-jalouse- mode-rhytm-e/ Candice Swanepoel, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Carmen Kass, Iris Strubegger, Monika Jagaciak (Jac),http://patrimoine.editionsjalou.com/jalouse- recherche-16.html Sasha Pivovarova,http://sasha.ldblog.jp/archives/12034402.html Bianca Balti and Caroline Winberg, for numerous editions as Harper's Bazaar, Vogue, Marie Claire, l'Officiel, El Pais as well as in independent magazines including Wonderland, Heroine, SSAW, Russh and Sleek. In front of her camera as a portraitist had stood personalities such as Michael Cimino,http://www.standardmagazine.com/michael-cimino-interview/ Amy Winehouse,http://www.gallimardmontreal.com/numerique/livre/amy-ma-fille- winehouse-mitch-9782081288478http://patrimoine.editionsjalou.com/lofficiel-de- la-mode-numero_925-page_72-detailp-13-1979-72.html Pharrell Williamshttp://patrimoine.editionsjalou.com/jalouse- numero_112-page_126-detailp-16-2064-126.html Marisa Berenson,http://patrimoine.editionsjalou.com/jalouse- numero_100-page_146-detailp-16-2031-146.html Cat Power,http://www.gettyimages.fr/detail/photo-d'actualit%C3%A9/singer-cat- power-poses-at-a-portrait-session-for-photo-dactualit%C3%A9/98160632 Kate Bosworth,http://www.gettyimages.fr/detail/photo-d'actualit%C3%A9/actress-kate- bosworth-poses-at-a-portrait-session-photo-dactualit%C3%A9/96323457 Eva Green, Evan Rachel Woodhttp://www.gettyimages.fr/detail/photo-d'actualit%C3%A9/actress-evan- rachel-wood-poses-at-a-portrait-session-photo-dactualit%C3%A9/95180738 and Diane Krugerhttp://patrimoine.editionsjalou.com/lofficiel-de-la-mode- recherche-13.html amongst others. Elina Kechicheva's artistic work has been exposed in Paris,http://en.vogue.fr/fashion-culture/fashion- events/diaporama/on-this-week-june-23/14989/carrousel#une-expo-12x21au- concept-store-broken-arm- http://www.lecabinetdecuriositesdethomaserber.com/bmw-paris/kuoni-road- trip.php Berlin, New York. In 2014 she wrote and directed short movie with the participation of Zoé le Ber, Solene Heberthttps://www.nowness.com/story/trois- soeurs and Priscilla de la Forcade named "3 Soeurs" which debuted in Nownesshttps://www.nowness.com/story/trois-soeurs and was later selected for Berlin Fashion Film Festival. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Bulgarian photographers Category:20th-century Bulgarian artists Category:20th-century photographers Category:21st-century Bulgarian artists Category:21st-century photographers
title: Elina Kechicheva
